title: New: Green Eyes – The Things I Often Do
body: Yet more subtle crooner pop from New York, **Green Eyes** impressed with his debut track, the melancholic murmur of [_Dusk on the 5th_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/22673-new-green-eyes-dusk-on-the-5th/), and has now returned with the 60’s swing of _The Things I Often Do_. So it’s far from being everyones cup of tea, it’s rough edged, verging upon monumentally cliched and lacking ‘a hook’ as such, but there’s something rather adorable to the twang of Green Eyes vocal and the unaltered, classical guitar. Check it out below.
